text: Ra jaba ibrahimale prarthana gare ki he palanahara! Yasa tha'umla'i santiko nagara bana'ide'u ra yasaka vasindaharu jo allahamathi ra akhiratako dinamathi astha rakhne chan, tiniharula'i khanako nimti phalaphulako ahara pradana gara, taba allahale bhan'yo ki maile anasthavanaharula'i pani kehi labha pradana garnechu, pheri tinala'i agoko sajaya bhognaka lagi vivasa garidinchu, januparne yo atyanta naramro tha'um ho
